label: 藤原宗忠
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: This aristocrat filled positions such as major controller of the right as well as leader of the chamberlains before rising to minister of the center and minister of the right in the 1130s. Munetada was particularly active as a scholar, and produced among his writings the massive diary Chūyūki.
